item.title: Triumph Cafe
item.description:
Area North
Address 3808 Spicewood Springs 78759
Phone 512-343-1875
Hours Mon–Thurs: 7a–9p
Fri: 7a–10p
Sat: 8a–10p
Sun: 9a–3p
triumphcafe.com

About Triumph Cafe

In addition to selling excellent coffee – both whole bean and by the cup – this place also has a crazy variety of food, serving breakfast, lunch, and dinner. For breakfast they have dishes like migas and huevos rancheros; for lunch and dinner it’s Thai food: spring rolls, stir fries, and more goodness. You might even run into Kinky Friedman.
item.dc:creator: Chad Hanna

item.title: Thunderbird Coffee
item.description:
Area North
Address 1401 W Koenig 78756
Phone 512-420-8660
Hours Mon–Fri: 7a–10p
Sat–Sun: 8a–10p

About Thunderbird Coffee

The sister of Clementine’s Coffee, things are run just as well at this coffeehouse. They picked an area of town that really needed a coffeehouse. In addition to coffee and espresso they serve paninis as well as cold sandwiches. Their iced coffees are actually cold brewed – a process that takes about twelve hours – so you know they care. They also have local beers on tap and wine for sale.

photo / Chad Hanna Thunderbird Coffee
item.dc:creator: Chad Hanna

item.title: Summermoon Coffee
item.description:
Area South First
Address 3115 S 1st # 1B 78704
Phone 512-804-1665
Hours Mon–Fri: 8a–10p
Sat: 7a–6p
Sun: Closed
woodfiredcoffee.com

About Summermoon

Summermoon boasts that they sell the only wood fired coffee in Austin. They brew organic, fair-trade coffee. They heat the coffee with fire, a method – they point out – that doesn’t use electricity or fossil fuels. They also sell paninis, soups, lunch combos, pastries, and empanadas.
item.dc:creator: Chad Hanna

item.title: Rio Rita Coffeehouse, Lounge
item.description:
Area East
Address 1308 E 6th 78702
Phone 512-524-0384
Hours Daily: 11a–2a
riorita.net

About Rio Rita

Rio Rita describes their establishment as “a mild mannered coffee shop by day, swanky lounge by night.” They host a number of art shows and live music events. But it’s also just a cool place to hang out. They serve sandwiches, vegetarian wraps, pizza from East Side Pies. They serve a blend of Ethiopian, Sumatran, Guatemalan, Peruvian and Nicaraguan Certified Organic Fair Trade Coffee. They sell it by the cup and the pound. They also sell beer, wine, and champagne.

photo / Chad Hanna Rio Rita
item.dc:creator: Chad Hanna

item.title: Pacha Coffeehouse
item.description:
Area North
Address 4618 Burnet 78756
Phone 512-420-8758
Hours Mon–Fri: 7a–7p
Sat–Sun: 8a–7p

About Pacha Coffeehouse

Pacha is a chill establishment on Burnet. In addition to coffee, espresso, and tea, handmade foods like empanadas, soups, salads, and breakfast tacos are served. With two porches, it’s a great place to get some reading done. They do not have Wi-Fi.

photo / Chad Hanna Pacha
item.dc:creator: Chad Hanna

item.title: Metro Espresso
item.description:
Area Central
Address 2222 Guadalupe 78705
Phone 512-474-5730
Hours Mon–Wed: 8a–10p
Thurs–Fri: 8a–8p
Sat: Closed
Sun: 12p–10p

About Metro Espresso

Metro is right across Guadalupe from UT. It’s a two story, glass front espresso bar populated by brushed steel tables and chairs along with some comfortable couches. Many students come into study – but you also have the strange element of people who just hang out on the drag. That said, this is a great place to people watch, especially if you go to the second floor, by the big window – you can see everything that’s going on. For food they have pre-made sandwiches, cookies, and croissants.

photo / Chad Hanna Metro Espresso
item.dc:creator: Chad Hanna

item.title: Little City Roasting Co.
item.description:
Area Congress
Address 916 Congress 78701
Phone 512-476-CITY
Hours Mon–Fri: 8a–12a
Sat: 9a–12a
Sun: 9a–10p
littlecity.com

About Little City

At Little City they don’t just serve coffee, they roast it too. In addition to coffee you can order espresso and tea – as well as an assortment of food. On the menu you’ll find a variety of sandwiches including roast beef, fish, rubens, and eggplant. Additional selections include Mediterranean plates, soups, salads – available as combo plates, as well as breakfast foods.

photo / Chad Hanna Little City
item.dc:creator: Chad Hanna

item.title: Lava Java
item.description:
Area Central
Address 2901 Medical Arts 78705
Phone 512-495-9299
Hours Mon–Thurs: 7:30p–12a
Fri: 7:30a–6p
Sat: 8:30a–6p
Sun: 8:30a–12a

About Lava Java

Lava Java is near the law school and many law students study there – but there’s also a peppering of doctors and nurses from the likewise nearby St. David’s Hospital. Though there are several coffeehouses throughout the nation with the same name, Lava Java (including one in Hawaii), none of them are related to one another beyond their name. This place is well know for their organic coffee and breakfast tacos.

photo / Chad Hanna Lava Java
item.dc:creator: Chad Hanna

item.title: La Tazza Fresca
item.description:
Area Central
Address 519 W 37th 78705
Phone 512-371-5383
Hours Daily: 7a–2a

About La Tazza Fresca

Located fairly close to campus, La Tazza Fresca is in the same building with Groovy Lube. Along with people getting their cars worked on, you’ll find students and a good number of regulars. They serve coffee and espresso, beer and wine. You can also get sandwiches and appetizers.
item.dc:creator: Chad Hanna

item.title: JP's Java
item.description:
Area Central
Address 2803 San Jacinto 78705
Phone 512-494-0015
Hours Mon–Thurs: 6a–2a
Fri–Sat: 6a–12a
7a–2a
jpsjava.com

About JP’s Java

Situated so close to campus, a great deal of studying goes on at JP’s. The place is well lighted with soft music and many furrowed brows, sprawling books, and open laptops. Pastries, muffins, sandwiches, fruit cups, and bagels compliment the coffee and espresso selections.

photo / Chad Hanna JP’s Java
item.dc:creator: Chad Hanna

item.title: Jo's Coffee
item.description:
Area Downtown
Address 242 W 2nd 78701
Phone 512-469-9003
Hours Daily: 7a–varies
Area South Congress
Address 1300 S Congress 78704
Phone 512-444-3800
Hours Daily: 7a–varies
joscoffee.com

About Jo’s Coffee

Jo’s coffee on South Congress is one of those intersections in Austin where you’ll most likely run into someone you know, someone who knows you, or someone who knows someone you know. They have kitchen baked goods, sandwiches both hot and cold. They also sell beer and American Spirit cigarettes. The West 2nd location has a more extensive menu with all kinds of stuff – from burgers to fresh fruit with yogurt.
item.dc:creator: Chad Hanna

item.title: Irie Bean Coffeehouse
item.description:
Area South
Address 2310 South Lamar # 102 78704
Phone 512-326-4636
Hours Sun: 8a–10p
Mon–Tues: 7:30-a–10p
Wed–Fri: 7:30a–12a
Sat: 8a–12p
www.iriebean.com

About Irie Bean Coffee

Irie Bean routinely has music and open mic events. They serve coffee and espresso along side chicken salad sandwiches, cold cut sandwiches, soup, bagels, and desserts.
item.dc:creator: Chad Hanna

item.title: Halcyon Coffeehouse, Bar, Lounge
item.description:
Area Downtown
Address 218 W 4th 78701
Phone 512-472-9637
Hours Mon–Wed: 7a–1a
Thurs: 7a–2a
Fri: 7a–3a
Sat: 8a–3a
Sun: 8a–1a
halcyonaustin.com

About Halcyon Coffeehouse, Bar, Lounge

Halcyon is right in the middle of downtown. You’ll find every kind of person here — students, hipsters, suits, couples, groups of revelers, tobacco aficionados who come into the in-house tobacco shop – everyone enjoying the board games and repartee. They serve sandwiches, wraps, soups, salads, and an extensive array of desserts, including s’mores that you get to cook yourself. They offer traditional coffee and espresso drinks as well as quality teas. And they have a full bar. So everyone should find something to enjoy.

photo / Chad Hanna Halcyon
item.dc:creator: Chad Hanna

item.title: Genuine Joe Coffeehouse
item.description:
Area North
Address 2001 W Anderson 78757
Phone 512-220-1576
Hours Mon–Fri: 7a–11p
Sat–Sun: 8a–11p
genuinejoe.com

About Genuine Joe Coffeehouse

The proprietor of Genuine Joe’s Coffeehouse describes it as a place for everyone: “Whether you’re a boot, suit, hippie, or techie, or you defy all labels, there’s a place for you here.” They serve coffee, espresso, and tea. For food they have pastries, scones, and other desserts – as well as soups and salads.

photo / Chad Hanna Genuine Joe’s
item.dc:creator: Chad Hanna

item.title: Garden District Coffeehouse
item.description:
Area South Congress
Address 2810 S Congress 78704
Phone 512-462-2473
Hours Mon–Fri: 7a–10p
Sat: 8a–10p
Sun: 9a–10p

About Garden District Coffeehouse

Garden District is situated on the edge of The Great Outdoors, South Congress’s go-to nursery. Along with coffee and espresso, the serve smoothies, appetizers, and sandwiches, in a lush, green setting.

photo / Chad Hanna Garden District Coffeehouse
item.dc:creator: Chad Hanna

item.title: Fair Bean Coffee
item.description:
Area South First
Address 2210 S 1st 78704
Phone 512-444-2326
Hours Mon–Fri: 6a–9p
Sat–Sun: 8a–10p

About Fair Bean Coffee

Fair Bean Coffee is fairly new on the South 1st scene. They serve French pressed coffee as well as drip – and espresso. They serve Latin food like empanadas, Spanish omelets, arepas, and desserts as well.

photo / Chad Hanna Fair Bean Coffee
item.dc:creator: Chad Hanna

item.title: Dominican Joe
item.description:
Area South
Address 515 S Congress # 108 78704
Phone 512-448-3919
Hours Mon–Fri: 6:30a–12a
Sat–Sun: 7a–12a
dominicanjoe.com

About Dominican Joe

Dominican Joe has an interesting mission: they purchase most of their coffee from Markarlos, an Austin-based nonprofit that supports farmers in the Dominican Republic by paying them higher wages for their product and helping their communities develop skills to better sustain themselves. Dominican Joe’s serves coffee, espresso, tea, and pre-prepared sandwiches and wraps.
item.dc:creator: Chad Hanna

item.title: Dolce Vita
item.description:
Area North Central
Address 4222 Duval 78751
Phone 512-323-2686
Hours Daily: 9a–12a

About Dolce Vita

Dolce Vita is an Italian cafe – they serve coffee and espresso along with gelato, sorbetto, desserts, sandwiches, beer, wine, and a full bar. It’s upscale and a nice place to catch dessert and a digestif after a date.

photo / Chad Hanna Dolce Vita
item.dc:creator: Chad Hanna

item.title: Dhaba Joy
item.description:
Area Central
Address 2900 Guadalupe 78705
Phone 512-320-0705
Hours Mon–Thurs: 9a–11p
Fri–Sat: 9a–12a
dhabajoy.com

About Dhaba Joy

Home to vegan speed dating – Dhaba Joy is located inside Toy Joy. They feature an all vegan menu along with their coffee and espresso: sandwiches, mac and cheese, smoothies, and fresh juices.
item.dc:creator: Chad Hanna

item.title: Cafe Medici
item.description:
Area Central
Address 1101 West Lynn 78703
Phone 512-524-5049
Hours Mon–Fri: 6a–10p
Sat–Sun: 6:30a–10p
caffemedici.com

About Cafe Medici

Cafe Medici is a coffee-lover’s coffeehouse. Their coffee is French pressed, served at the optimal temperature. They have a limited number of sandwiches for sale in a day. But the focus is mostly on the coffee and espresso. For example, they serve La Marzocco FB70 Hybrid espresso; their coffee is a blend comprised of beans from Colombian, Guatemala, Costa Rica and Brazil. They also offer whole bean coffee in ten to fifteen varieties of sustainable, fair-trade, organic beans.

photo / Chad Hanna Cafe Medici
item.dc:creator: Chad Hanna
